Function Documentation

void scheduler ( char **  inputfile,
char **  algorithm,
int *  quantum,
int *  expire,
int *  mode 
)

Handles the algorithm selection, depending on which scheduling method was specified via the command line.

Parameters:
inputfile The name of the input file containing the processes
algorithm The desired schedulaing algorithm
quantum The desired time quantum (for round robin scheduling only)
expire The time at which the memory state is cloned for printing to the output file
mode The program mode. 0 represents Scheduler mode, 1 represents Virtual Memory mode
